DOC.brief_summary: The objectives of the data search is to find out if there is correlation between pre, post serum sodium concentration, dialysate sodium concentration, interdialytic weight gain and associated changes in pre and post systolic and diastolic blood pressure, mean arterial pressure, number of blood pressure medications and adherence to 3 times per week dialysis, mortality.
DOC.brief_title: Are we Loading Our Patients With Sodium During Hemodialysis Treatments?
